Action-group

Display several buttons or links consecutively. The group ensures that the buttons or links are aligned correctly.

Installation 

                  
                    npm i @govflanders/vl-ui-action-group

or 

                  
                    yarn add @govflanders/vl-ui-action-group

Usage

Import SASS 

                  
                  @import "vl-ui-action-group/src/scss/action-group";

Make sure your sass --include-path includes node_modules/@govflanders/.

Action group

Wrap a series of buttons in an action group element to organise them. Collapse the action group on a certain breakpoint by adding .vl-action-group--collapse--[m,s,xs].

      <div class="vl-action-group">
  <button class="vl-button">
    Aanvraag starten
  </button>
  <button class="vl-button vl-button--secondary">
    Annuleren
  </button>
  </div>

Action group align center

All buttons are aligned to the center of the action group. Add the vl-action-group--align-center class.

      <div class="vl-action-group vl-action-group--align-center">
  <button class="vl-button">
    Aanvraag starten
  </button>
  <button class="vl-button vl-button--secondary">
    Annuleren
  </button>
  </div>

Action group align right

All buttons are aligned to the right side of the action group. Add the vl-action-group--align-right class.

      <div class="vl-action-group vl-action-group--align-right">
  <button class="vl-button">
    Aanvraag starten
  </button>
  <button class="vl-button vl-button--secondary">
    Annuleren
  </button>
  </div>

Action group space between

Action group with equal space between the buttons. Add the vl-action-group--space-between class.

      <div class="vl-action-group vl-action-group--space-between">
  <button class="vl-button">
    Aanvraag starten
  </button>
  <button class="vl-button vl-button--secondary">
    Annuleren
  </button>
  </div>

Action group - collapse on breakpoint

Action group that collapses on a certain breakpoint. This will put the actions underneath each other, usefull for smaller screens where buttons are too large to stay next to each other.

      <div class="vl-action-group vl-action-group--collapse--xs">
  <button class="vl-button">
    Aanvraag starten
  </button>
  <button class="vl-button vl-button--secondary">
    Annuleren
  </button>
  </div>

Action group with links

All modifiers from above apply also on a group of links.

Notificaties Opleidingen Locaties 
      <div class="vl-action-group">
  <a href="#" class="vl-link">
    <i class="vl-link__icon vl-link__icon--before vl-vi vl-vi-bell" aria-hidden="true" ></i>
      Notificaties
    </a>

  <a href="#" class="vl-link">
    <i class="vl-link__icon vl-link__icon--before vl-vi vl-vi-graduate" aria-hidden="true" ></i>
      Opleidingen
    </a>

  <a href="#" class="vl-link">
    <i class="vl-link__icon vl-link__icon--before vl-vi vl-vi-pin" aria-hidden="true" ></i>
      Locaties
    </a>

  </div>

Action group width bordered links

Add a line between each link in an action group by adding the vl-action-group--bordered class.

Notificaties Opleidingen Locaties 
      <div class="vl-action-group vl-action-group--bordered">
  <a href="#" class="vl-link">
    <i class="vl-link__icon vl-link__icon--before vl-vi vl-vi-bell" aria-hidden="true" ></i>
      Notificaties
    </a>

  <a href="#" class="vl-link">
    <i class="vl-link__icon vl-link__icon--before vl-vi vl-vi-graduate" aria-hidden="true" ></i>
      Opleidingen
    </a>

  <a href="#" class="vl-link">
    <i class="vl-link__icon vl-link__icon--before vl-vi vl-vi-pin" aria-hidden="true" ></i>
      Locaties
    </a>

  </div>
